title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your passionate and unconditional support for a family member or close friend helps them move mountains today. They might not be able to shove aside Mount Everest easily, but when someone is weighed down by depression or worries, they may feel like theyre buried under a ridge. Fortunately, you can make an immense difference with a phone call or visit while sweet Venus journeys through your 4th House of Emotional Security. A healthy dose of doting care and kindness is a remedy you can easily provide. Sometimes, love is all the leverage you need to lift others up. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
